Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the village of Woodbury's authority to impose a hotel and motel tax
Summary: Extends the village of Woodbury's authority to impose a hotel and motel tax for two additional years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 291 of the laws of 2023, amending the tax law relating to the imposition of a hotel and motel tax in the village of Woodbury, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
